ivardefs.name: cardinalityBehavior
ivardefs.desc: Defines whether the action can be selected multiple times.

ivardefs.name: code_
ivardefs.desc: A code that provides meaning for the action or action group. For example, a section may have a LOINC code for a the section of a documentation template.

ivardefs.name: condition_
ivardefs.desc: An expression that describes applicability criteria, or start/stop conditions for the action.

ivardefs.name: definition
ivardefs.desc: A reference to an ActivityDefinition that describes the action to be taken in detail, or a PlanDefinition that describes a series of actions to be taken.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A short description of the action used to provide a summary to display to the user.

ivardefs.name: documentation_
ivardefs.desc: Didactic or other informational resources associated with the action that can be provided to the CDS recipient. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources.

ivardefs.name: dynamicValue_
ivardefs.desc: Customizations that should be applied to the statically defined resource. For example, if the dosage of a medication must be computed based on the patient's weight, a customization would be used to specify an expression that calculated the weight, and the

ivardefs.name: goalId_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies goals that this action supports. The reference must be to a goal element defined within this plan definition.

ivardefs.name: groupingBehavior
ivardefs.desc: Defines the grouping behavior for the action and its children.

ivardefs.name: input_
ivardefs.desc: Defines input data requirements for the action.

ivardefs.name: label
ivardefs.desc: A user-visible label for the action.

ivardefs.name: output_
ivardefs.desc: Defines the outputs of the action, if any.

ivardefs.name: participant_
ivardefs.desc: Indicates who should participate in performing the action described.

ivardefs.name: precheckBehavior
ivardefs.desc: Defines whether the action should usually be preselected.

ivardefs.name: reason_
ivardefs.desc: A description of why this action is necessary or appropriate.

ivardefs.name: relatedAction_
ivardefs.desc: A relationship to another action such as "before" or "30-60 minutes after start of".

ivardefs.name: requiredBehavior
ivardefs.desc: Defines the requiredness behavior for the action.

ivardefs.name: selectionBehavior
ivardefs.desc: Defines the selection behavior for the action and its children.

ivardefs.name: textEquivalent
ivardefs.desc: A text equivalent of the action to be performed. This provides a human-interpretable description of the action when the definition is consumed by a system that may not be capable of interpreting it dynamically.

ivardefs.name: title
ivardefs.desc: The title of the action displayed to a user.

ivardefs.name: transform
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a StructureMap resource that defines a transform that can be executed to produce the intent resource using the ActivityDefinition instance as the input.

ivardefs.name: triggerDefinition_
ivardefs.desc: A description of when the action should be triggered.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: The type of action to perform (create, update, remove).

properties.desc: An action to be taken as part of the plan.
